description: a(n)=Sum{d(i)*7^i: i=0,1,...,m}, where Sum{d(i)*6^i: i=0,1,...,m} is the base 6 representation of n.
comments: Except for the offset, identical to A020657: a(n)=A020657(n+1). - _M. F. Hasler_, Oct 05 2014
links: Clark Kimberling, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
crossrefs: Essentially a duplicate of A020657. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 04 2016
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: Offset changed to 0 by _Clark Kimberling_, Aug 14 2012
